post:
Hi there,

I'm happy to announce that for a limited time, we offer a 50% off recurring discount for our OVA and OVB Virtual Server plans.
They are powered by the OpenVZ 7 technology and are provisioned instantly.

[OVA] - 2.75 EUR/mo (discount applied)
1 CPU @ 2.60 GHz
1024 MB RAM DDR3 ECC
10 GB STORAGE
250 Mbps
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6
rDNS Included

[OVB] - 4.10 EUR/mo (discount applied)
2 CPU @ 2.60 GHz
2048 MB RAM DDR3 ECC
30 GB STORAGE
250 Mbps
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6
rDNS Included

Order link: https://www.hetnix.com/openvz-servers

PROMO CODE: **HALFPRICING**

PS: Please do not bother to order if you intend to use it for "legitimate business email sending" (yeah, sure) or bruteforce/ssh scan. It will be terminated with no refunds.

Should you have any questions, please let me know.

Thank you.
